goal.en: Ring and module theory is a important subject in mathematics. Students will be trained for the abilities of abstract thinking and independent thinking thought this course.
goal.ch: 環與模的理論是數學中重要的基礎科目。透過此課程，培養學生抽象思考與獨立思考的能力。

content.en: We will study the ring theory, module theory and representation theory. If time permits, we will study the applications for Lie theory.
content.ch: 我們將介紹環論、模論與表現理論的基本知識。 若時間充足，我們將講授李理論的方面的應用。

textbook.en: Title：Algebras and Representation Theory (Springer Undergraduate Mathematics Series book series) Authors：Karin Erdmann, Thorsten Holm ISBN: 978-3-319-91997-3
textbook.ch: 書名：Algebras and Representation Theory (Springer Undergraduate Mathematics Series book series) 作者：Karin Erdmann, Thorsten Holm ISBN: 978-3-319-91997-3

grading.en: “Attendance and performance: 10％ Quiz and homework: 20％ Midterm exam: 20％ Final exam: 30％“
grading.ch: “課堂表現及出席率:10％ 小考及作業:30％ 期中考:30％ 期末考試:30％“

flex_desc.ch: 第17、18周的教學活動將以自主學習、補充教學以及補救教學方式進行。
